text.more:
This chart shows the network of projects and investors that are linked, up to 2 degrees of separation, to DCG's investments.

For example, DCG is one of the investors in the Seed round for Project X together with another investor, Investor Y. This relationship will be represented in the chart by DCG -> Project X <- Investor Y, where the arrow represents the direction of capital flow.
text.intro: This chart shows the network of projects and investors that are linked, directly or indirectly, to DCG's investments.
text.title: The DCG Contagion
